title: Relaxing Cookies
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Hmm.... This might be a little too much time to spend on dance training. We shouldn’t neglect basic training too....  and....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Is that a new training plan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes. We would like to try a formation that’s slightly more difficult, so I’m making some adjustments to account for that. However, it’s quite hard to find a balance that fits within the time.... It’s like a puzzle. Hmm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Dia-san, open your mouth~.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh? *munch*.... It’s delicious! What is this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Here’s the next one.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>*Munch*.... It’s melting in my mouth.... This is happiness....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, it’s a cookie called Boule De Neige. You were groaning and you looked so serious. But right now you look so happy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>How embarrassing....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Let’s take a little break. I’ll make some tea~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
